text: "Lost" is a 2023 song by Linkin Park. It was originally recorded for their second studio album Meteora and was later released as the leading single from the 20th anniversary edition of the album. It went to number 18 in the United Kingdom, number 51 in Ireland, number 49 in Australia, number 5 in Germany, number 28 in Canada and number 58 in the United States. == Track listing == ==References== Category:2002 songs Category:2023 songs Category:2020s ballads Category:Hard rock songs Category:Linkin Park songs
title: Lost (Linkin Park song)
